spatial_accuracy.notes: Severe layout inversion. The 3D render represents a mirrored or rotated orientation compared to the floor plan. The staircase, bathroom, and bedroom have been relocated relative to the main kitchen/living zone. Door swings and specific window quantities on the perimeter walls do not match the blueprint.

structural_fidelity.notes: The model lacks the external balcony/terrace shown on the left of the floor plan. While it lacks text labels and sits on a neutral background, the internal structural walls have been reinterpreted, including the addition of extra partition walls not present in the 2D source.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is present as block-style elements, but the mapping is incorrect. A second bed appears to have been hallucinated in a room that should be a bathroom or utility area, and the dining table/sofa arrangement is inconsistent.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent adherence to style constraints. The model uses low-poly geometry, monochromatic flat shading, and an isometric orthographic camera on a dark background.

detected_errors.description: Floor plan orientation is mirrored or distorted; rooms (bathroom/stairs) are in the wrong positions relative to the entrance.
Missing the large exterior balcony/planter area shown on the left side of the floor plan.
Hallucinated furniture/room usage; an extra bed is placed in the lower-right quadrant which should be utility/bathroom space.
Window and door count on the southern and western walls do not match the blueprint's rhythmic spacing.
